      • ARTermination

        public long ARTermination(ApiUserContextI ctx)
                   throws ARException
        Description copied from interface: ApiProxyI
        Performs environment-specific cleanup routines and disconnects from the specified Action Request System session. All API programs that interact with AR System should call this function upon completing work in a given session. Calling this function is especially important in environments that use floating licenses. If you do not disconnect from the server, your license token is unavailable for other users for the defined time-out interval.
        Specified by:
        ARTermination in interface ApiProxyI
        Specified by:
        ARTermination in class ApiProxyBase
        Throws:
        ARException - if routines are not performed

      • ARVerifyUser

        public void ARVerifyUser(ApiUserContextI ctx)
                  throws ARException
        Description copied from interface: ApiProxyI
        Checks the cache on the specified server to determine whether the user you specify for the control parameter is registered in AR System.
        Throws:
        ARException - if cache is not checked
